name: carousel
author: Saikiran-Sugurthi
preview: A flexible, responsive, and accessible Carousel component for sliding content.

props.name: children
props.description: The slides to display inside the carousel (e.g., images or custom components).

props.name: autoplay
props.description: Whether the carousel should play automatically.

props.name: interval
props.description: The time (in ms) between automatic slide transitions.

props.name: loop
props.description: Whether the carousel should loop back after the last slide.

props.name: showArrows
props.description: Whether to display the left and right navigation arrows.

props.name: showDots
props.description: Whether to display the pagination dots at the bottom.
